Forgot Password

Apr 9, 2015

You can reset your password by going to the Zype Platform and following the photo tutorial below.

Step 1:

Go to the Zype Platform and click on “Forgot your password.”

Step 2:

Fill in the email that you used to sign up for your Zype account.

Step 3:

Receive an email from Zype and click on “Change my password.”

Step 4:

Enter new password and confirm your new password
